document.full_text: a reputed neo-nazi accused of planting a backpack bomb along the parade route of a martin luther king jr. day celebration was newly charged on thursday with committing federal hate crimes.
document.title: suspect in mlk day bomb plot charged with hate crimes
lines_and_colors: a reputed neo-nazi accused of planting a backpack bomb along the parade route of a martin luther king jr. day celebration was newly charged on thursday with committing federal hate crimes.
